txt.en: This scroll bestows the Virtues of the Valar quest, which will provide you with several tokens to improve your Virtues.\n\nYou must be level 95 to accept this quest.

Complete this quest to receive tokens which will allow you to advance your Virtues to an appropraite tier for level 95.

<rgb=#FFFF00>Important: Make sure to select each virtue you wish to advance before using a virtue scroll!
 -> Open Traits Panel: 'j' 
 -> Select Tab: Virtue Traits
 -> Select Virtue</rgb>
This quest grants several tokens that are used to advance each of your virtues to your new level. \n\nMake sure to select the virtue(s) to advance before consuming each token.
You may complete this quest at any time.
